title: Add sibling mode configuration to org-gtd-graph-navigation.el
description: Add org-gtd-graph-sibling-mode defcustom with three options (any-same-blocker, all-same-blockers, dag-level). Add sibling calculation functions and update next/previous-sibling to dispatch based on config

title: Fix remove-root-task test - FIRST_TASKS not being recalculated when root is removed
Implement remove-from-project multiple parents logic
Simplify remove-task to only remove from current project (not trash)
Run full test suite and verify
description: Run eldev compile and eldev etest -B to verify all changes work correctly

title: Graph View UX Cleanup: Remove zoom/history, add sibling mode config, update legends
Evaluate removal of with-org-gtd-context from codebase/user API
description: Investigate if with-org-gtd-context macro is still needed or can be removed from user-facing API. Check what settings it configures and if they can be set globally or are truly needed per-call. Consider backward compatibility.

title: Add 'actions' category to GTD view DSL
description: Single-action items (ORG_GTD=Actions) are missing from the DSL. Should be (category . actions) like other categories. Need to TDD add it and update documentation to make it one of the first examples.

title: Implement insert-after with one successor
description: Replace current add-child delegation. When selected has one successor: A→B becomes A→C→B. Remove A→B, add A→C and C→B dependencies.

title: Implement insert-before with multiple predecessors
description: When selected task has multiple predecessors, prompt user to choose which parent to insert after. Only rewire that parent→selected edge to parent→new→selected. Leave other parents unchanged.

title: Implement org-gtd-view-show function
description: Add org-gtd-view-show function to provide clean DSL API for showing GTD views. Function should accept a view-spec and display it as an agenda. Eliminates boilerplate from user code.

title: Feature: Add KEYS parameter to org-gtd-view-show for multiple concurrent views
close_reason: All tasks complete, KEYS parameter implemented, 781 tests pass

title: Fix test interaction issue with refile test
Update org-gtd-view-show to accept optional KEYS parameter
Add test for default key behavior
Remove zoom from org-gtd-graph-transient.el
description: Remove zoom entry from main transient menu, remove org-gtd-graph-transient-zoom prefix

title: Update add-child and insert-before to prioritize current project tasks
Fix failing two-view-show test to use different KEYS
Remove navigation history from org-gtd-graph-ui.el
description: Remove history/future variables, remove push-history/back/forward functions, simplify select-node to remove history logic

title: Add test for same key reusing buffer
Remove first/last layer functions from org-gtd-graph-navigation.el
Create helper function to exclude current project tasks from selection
Update legends in org-gtd-graph-view.el
description: Update legend text in both --display-svg and --display-ascii to: remove zoom, clarify n/p wording, add S-TAB, cleaner formatting

title: Update add-root to exclude current project tasks from selection
Remove keybindings from org-gtd-graph-mode.el
description: Remove keybindings for < > [ ] and update mode docstring to remove history references

title: Write test for remove-from-project with multiple parents
Update documentation for KEYS parameter
Evaluate removal of org-gtd-core-prepare-agenda-buffers from codebase
description: Investigate if org-gtd-core-prepare-agenda-buffers is still needed or can be removed. Check all call sites and understand what it does. Determine if org-mode handles this automatically or if we need it.

title: Implement insert-after with multiple successors
description: When selected has multiple successors, prompt user to choose which child to insert before. Only rewire that selected→child edge to selected→new→child. Leave other children unchanged. Symmetrical with insert-before behavior.

title: Remove zoom feature from org-gtd-graph-filter.el
description: Remove zoom-node-id field from filter struct, remove zoom application in filter-apply, remove zoom-to-subtree and zoom-out-full functions

title: Fix trash-task to handle orphaned successors correctly
Create helper function to prioritize current project tasks in selection
notes:
Tests consistently fail with wrong ordering. All other graph transient tests PASS, suggesting test infrastructure works.

Current implementation:
- org-gtd-graph--get-all-gtd-tasks: Uses with-org-gtd-context + 'agenda scope
- org-gtd-graph--select-or-create-task-prioritizing-current: Uses org-gtd-get-task-projects
- Filters out project headings (ORG_GTD='Projects')
- Partitions by project membership using (member project-id project-ids)

Test Results:
- Test 1: Expects task-in-project first, gets different ID (wrong ordering)  
- Test 2: PASSES (finds external task correctly)
- Test 3: Gets nil (empty result list)

Logic appears sound but results don't match. Needs investigation into:
1. Why test 1 returns wrong ID first (partitioning issue?)
2. Why test 3 returns empty (org-map-entries not finding tasks?)
3. Possible difference in how test vs production buffers/files are handled

title: Fix add-blocker to insert between task and parent
